abstract: Toyota had a particularly strong performance in the three months through March, despite recalls of models with safety problems.
snippet: Toyota had a particularly strong performance in the three months through March, despite recalls of models with safety problems.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — Despite being mired in recalls and inquiries into its safety record, Toyota roared back to a profit in the fiscal year that just ended and forecast on Tuesday a further increase in earnings.

headline.main: Despite Recalls, Toyota Reports $1.2 Billion Profit
headline.print_headline: Despite Recalls, Toyota Reports $1.2 Billion Profit

abstract: Gold hit another record high on Wednesday, while Asian stock markets slipped further and the euro remained under pressure — all signs of the intense nervousness that continues to dog the global financial markets despite the massive rescue package to combat the European debt crisis.
snippet: Gold hit another record high on Wednesday, while Asian stock markets slipped further and the euro remained under pressure — all signs of the intense nervousness that continues to dog the global financial markets despite the massive rescue package ...
lead_paragraph: Gold hit another record high on Wednesday, while Asian stock markets slipped further and the euro remained under pressure — all signs of the intense nervousness that continues to dog the global financial markets despite the massive rescue package to combat the European debt crisis.

headline.main: Gold Hits Fresh High as Uncertainty Prevails
